TopicTitle: Ballistic capture could lead to easier travel to Mars

Articles.Content:
Has anybody tried this in KPS? For Duna of course.

http://au.ibtimes.com/articles/577354/20141230/mars-trip-ballistic-capture.htm#.VKL6bV4AAg

Not again...

It doesn't work in KSP because of the n-body requirement. If it did, you might well be disappointed at the actual performance. The paper is rather accessible, if you don't believe me.

Perhaps it ws mentioned in http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104823-Ballistic-capture-possible-with-KSP

Thanks for the response and yes this is what I was asking.
